summary: REQ-2 appears implemented by adding a footer download link/button and an instruction line pointing to a configured ZIP path. REQ-1 is not implemented because no ZIP asset was added to the repository under a static public directory in the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a downloadable ZIP artifact of the full project (frontend + backend) into the repository as a static file under `frontend/public/assets/downloads/` (or equivalent) and serve it as a static asset.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files, and there is no evidence of a ZIP file being added under `frontend/public/assets/downloads/` (or any other public static directory). Only a link/path constant referencing `/assets/downloads/full-project-source.zip` was added.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated `project_state.json` new_feature_requests and statuses not requested by the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest requirements focus on adding a static ZIP asset and exposing it in the footer; it does not mention maintaining or modifying a project tracking/state JSON file.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new config constant `SOURCE_CODE_ZIP_PATH` in landing config.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 requires exposing a download link; it does not explicitly require introducing a configuration constant to store the path (though it's a reasonable implementation detail).
